::Orchestra::

    Orchestra was ready to leave for his mission.  He sighed as he left, he
wanted to say goodbye to Blacknightmare, the one he loved.

    "Ah well," he thought to himself, then his jetpack came out from his
back and he zoomed off to the Alliance base.
